messages.title: PEOPLE ARE SWITCHING TO BACK THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have raised half a million pounds from grassroots supporters, more than since General Election was called, showing the swap as Labour support collapses.

messages.title: YOU CAN CHANGE THE FUTURE OF BRITAIN
messages.content: With Labour in meltdown, more and more people are turning to the Liberal Democrats. The Lib Dems are fighting to protect what's most important to families - our NHS, schools and jobs.

messages.title: ONLY THE LIB DEMS WILL DELIVER CHANGE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tim Farron's Liberal Democrats are the effective opposition to more Conservative cuts.

issues.health: The Lib Dems are fighting to protect the NHS

housing.content: The Lib Dems are fighting to protect...jobs

endorsements.endorsement: Lib Dem's have seen a strong start to their fundraising, smashing past all records.
Liberal Democrats celebrate stunning council wins in both North and South.

quotes.text: "Labour is fatally divided inside Parliament and outside it."
"Labour are too weak and split to deliver the change we need."
"Jeremy Corbyn's leadership is no longer tenable if we are to be effective."
"I will not countenance ever voting to make Corbyn Prime Minister."

images.caption: Tim Farron's Lib Dems are the effective opposition to the Conservatives
The choice in this election is clear: Only the Lib Dems will deliver change
